description: A peaceful samurai has his meal stolen by a cat after being attacked by a ninja. He then falls into a river and drifts over a waterfall.

titles.title: Sport Captain Episode No.18: Assassin Descended from the Mountain Hunt!!
Sport Taisa Dai 18 Wa "Shikaku ga Yamagari ni Kita!!"
スポーツ大佐 第18話「刺客が山狩りに来た!!」
